name: Someone in Mesa Loves Me - American Apparel
description:
This shirt makes the perfect gift for a loved one or even yourself.    Printed with red ink on a premium American Apparel Ash/White striped shirt.  Adult sizes are unisex; women may want to order a size smaller.

Local pickup option is free and is available at a business office near Broadway and Greenfield during normal business hours.  We will notify you when the shirts are ready for pickup and give you further details.  

PLEASE MAKE SURE TO PROVIDE PAYPAL WITH A VALID EMAIL ADDRESS WHEN YOU CHECK OUT.

name: Color Swatch for Custom Orders
description:
These are the available colors for the Someone in Mesa Loves Me and Diving Lady shirts.  Please e-mail us at iheartmesa@gmail.com to confirm your shirt color(s) or please write your choice in the notes section upon checkout.  

If you have any questions on additional larger sizes, color choices, or possible group discounts, please e-mail us directly.
